mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_INFO (ACCOUNT_NUM, USER_ID, PRODUCT_NUM, BALANCE, ACCOUNT_DATE) VALUES (#{account_num}, #{user_id}, #{product_num}, 0, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT P.PRODUCT_NAME, P.PRODUCT_RATE, A.* FROM PRODUCT_INFO P INNER JOIN ACCOUNT_INFO A ON P.PRODUCT_NUM = A.PRODUCT_NUM WHERE A.ACCOUNT_NUM = #{account_num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TRADE_HISTORY (TRADE_NUM, ACCOUNT_NUM, BALANCE, TRADE_TYPE, TRADE_AMOUNT, TRADE_DATE) VALUES (TRADE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{account_num}, #{balance}, '출금', #{trade_amount}, SYSDATE)
INSERT INTO TRADE_HISTORY (TRADE_NUM, ACCOUNT_NUM, BALANCE, TRADE_TYPE, TRADE_AMOUNT, TRADE_DATE) VALUES (TRADE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{account_num}, #{balance}, '입금', #{trade_amount}, SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE ACCOUNT_INFO SET BALANCE = BALANCE - ? WHERE ACCOUNT_NUM = #{account_num}
